article_title: It's Not Against The Law For Doctors To Ask Patients About Guns, A New Report Concludes

article_metadata.description: Physicians are reluctant to ask patients whether they have firearms at home for a number of reasons, including the concern that doing so is illegal. But a new report concludes that there currently are no laws that prohibit doctors from asking patients about guns.
article_metadata.author: Rita Rubin

og.description: Physicians are reluctant to ask patients whether they have firearms at home for a number of reasons, including the concern that doing so is illegal. But a new report concludes that there currently are no laws that prohibit doctors from asking patients about guns.
